casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Myron T. FARRAR. No. 320P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Chris Z. Sinha, Assistant Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of May 2007 by Defendant for Leave to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
